subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary objective of a fiscal policy?
question_hi: प्रमुख विभागीय मामले क्या है अनुमानित प्राप्ति की प्रमाणीय विभागीय मामले?
C_en: Increase in both government expenditure and taxation
C_hi: सरकारी निवेश और टैक्स की विज्ञान
explanation_en: The primary objective of a fiscal policy is to achieve a balance between government expenditure and taxation. In other words, it aims to increase both government spending and tax revenue simultaneously.
